name: Warclaw Mastery
description: Unlock the warclaw mount, its skills, and its abilities.

ranks.effect: While mounted, periodically grant nearby allies the ability to run at warclaw speed.
Your warclaw gains an extra stamina bar.
Battle Maul deals increased damage to enemies who are in a downed state.
Unlock a second skill that allows your warclaw to detect enemies.
Unlock a third skill that allows your warclaw to pull on gates to damage them.
Unlock a fourth skill that enables you to throw a spear at a mounted player, dismounting you both.
